attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious, from his tirade over the statement from Howard Schultz, that this unelected and proven crook that he is in denial over the state of the economy of the UK.  Even those with half a brain and only one eye cannot fail to see that the UK economy is in a downward spiral (why else would the banks be asking for even MORE taxpayer funding) so somebody in that state of mind should NOT be representing the interests of the taxpayers of the UK, regardless of the dirt he has over Gordon McBroon, which caused Gordon McBroon to appoint him to the House of Lords, despite his despicable record.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
